div.p: Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Appointment|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

tr.td: Element `Appointment.class` has a context of Appointment based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Appointment`.

div.p: Group 3 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Appointment|5.0.0 to FHIR Extensions Packversion: 5.2.0)

tr.td: Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Appointment.replaces` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`.
